allow: Bash(which supabase 2>/dev/null || echo "no supabase cli"; npx supabase --version 2>/dev/null || echo "npx not available")

Bash(node --version && cat /Users/yash/finance-dashboard/package.json | python3 -c "import sys,json; p=json.load\(sys.stdin\); print\(json.dumps\({**p.get\('dependencies',{}\), **p.get\('devDependencies',{}\)}, indent=2\)\)")
Bash(npm_config_cache=/tmp/npm-cache npm install --save-dev tsx dotenv 2>&1 | tail -5)
Bash(npx tsc --noEmit 2>&1 && npm run build 2>&1 | tail -20)

Bash(git add \\
  app/page.tsx \\
  app/transactions/page.tsx \\
  app/api/ \\
  components/AccountsPanel.tsx \\
  components/BudgetsClient.tsx \\
  components/DashboardClient.tsx \\
  components/TransactionsClient.tsx \\
  components/AddTransactionModal.tsx \\
  components/DateRangeFilter.tsx \\
  components/TransactionModal.tsx \\
  lib/database.types.ts \\
  lib/db.ts \\
  lib/plaid.ts \\
  supabase/plaid_items.sql \\
  package.json \\
  package-lock.json)

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<'EOF'
Add Plaid integration, date filters, transaction editing, and spending tracker

- Plaid Link integration: create-link-token, exchange-token, sync API routes
  with cursor-based transaction sync and account upsert
- Date range filter \(DateRangeFilter component\) on Dashboard and Transactions
  pages with presets: This Month, Last Month, Last 90 Days, Last Year, Last 2 Years,
  and a custom date picker; server pages now fetch a 2-year transaction window
- Remove Net Worth from AccountsPanel
- Transaction editing modal \(TransactionModal\): edit date, description, amount,
  category, subcategory with "apply to all from vendor" recategorization flow
- Add Transaction modal \(AddTransactionModal\): full form with account selector,
  income/expense toggle, category/subcategory dropdowns backed by budget data
- Spending Tracker widget on Dashboard: SVG circular progress ring, vs-last-month
  comparison, and per-category progress bars \(replaces simple budget bar\)
- Budget chart: horizontal bold wrapped X-axis labels with horizontal scrolling
- Fix Supabase Database type \(add Relationships/Views/Functions\) to resolve
  TypeScript never errors on upsert overloads

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
